Sentencas: The oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and diffusion mechanisms on 25% Sr-doped LaMnO3 (LSM) cathode materials as well as their kinetic behavior have been studied by using spin-polarized density functional theory (DFT) calculations.
Titulo: Computational Investigation of O2 Reduction and Diffusion on 25% Sr-Doped LaMnO3 Cathodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Bader charge and frequency analyses were carried out to identify the oxidation state of adsorbed oxygen species.
Titulo: Computational Investigation of O2 Reduction and Diffusion on 25% Sr-Doped LaMnO3 Cathodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: DFT and molecular dynamics (MD) results show that the fast O-2 adsorption/reduction process via superoxide and peroxide intermediates is energetically favorable on the Mn site rather than on the Sr site.
Titulo: Computational Investigation of O2 Reduction and Diffusion on 25% Sr-Doped LaMnO3 Cathodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the higher adsorption energies on the Mn site of the (110) surface compared to those on the (100) surface imply that the former is more efficient for O-2 reduction.
Titulo: Computational Investigation of O2 Reduction and Diffusion on 25% Sr-Doped LaMnO3 Cathodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Significantly, we predict that oxygen vacancies enhance O-2 reduction kinetics and that the O-ion migration through the bulk is dominant over that on cathode.
Titulo: Computational Investigation of O2 Reduction and Diffusion on 25% Sr-Doped LaMnO3 Cathodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
